document.full_text: democratic senators introduced a bill on tuesday that would repeal tax breaks enjoyed by the five biggest oil companies, freeing up $21 billion over a decade to ease the budget deficit.
document.title: senate bill squeezes big oil to ease deficit
lines_and_colors: democratic senators introduced a bill on tuesday that would repeal tax breaks enjoyed by the five biggest oil companies, freeing up $21 billion over a decade to ease the budget deficit.
